messages.message:
New Release available 2.1.1


Changes and fixes in this release which I hope will improve the overall experience.
  1. Added Italian translation with thanks to Stefano1975t
  2. Skill and attribute abbreviation on the Character and Synthetic Skills tab are now localised.
  3. Agenda, Talent and Specialty items now set a default icon but can be changed as per a normal item..
  4. Added Critical Injury table dropdown and roll button to the Creature sheets (See Creature section).
  5. Added a 'Homebrew' selection to the character and synthetic Career dropdowns.
  6. Increased width of crew position dropdown on the vehicle sheet as it was compressed when using Firefox.
  7. Rolling Piloting on the vehicle sheet now includes the Manoeuvrability modifier.
  8. Fixed odd issue with weapons rolls on the vehicle sheet.
  9. Corrected bug that sets Token Vision on creatures to

.
  • Fixed issue with Armor rolls on the Inventory sheet for Synthetics.
  • Fixed issue with /em chat background colour.
  • Corrected issue with Maestro add-on not working for Vehicle weapons.
  • Corrected Radiation rolling issue when using languages other than English.
  • Fixed error with weight calculation for armour when in the foot locker.
  • Refactored Critical Injury code.

    • This will be the last release for Foundry VTT V9 as I need to start working on the V10 upgrade
    Remember... Back up your worlds before upgrading to the new version.
    Please read the @JournalEntry[MU/TH/ER Instructions.] to get the most benefit out of using the system and new features.
